targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> group()
  |> last()

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_in_epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

total_weight = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value)
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * uint(v: 100) / total_weight._value}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value)
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "justified_block")
  |> group(columns: ["justified_block"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "finalized")
  |> group(columns: ["finalized"])
  |> last()

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

total_weight = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value - uint(v: 1))
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * uint(v: 100) / total_weight._value}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value - uint(v: 1))
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> count()

panels.description:
- `value` = the epoch number
- Last 5 Epochs only
- Its an awkward chart. You must select the last 30 mins as timeframe to display properly (ie 180 blocks in minutes)
- Set to 5 mins for hayabusa devnet (18 block epochs)

targets.query:
import "date"

start = v.timeRangeStart

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -1y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

epoch = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "vechain")
    |> range(start: -5h)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed" or r["_field"] == "active_weight" or r["_field"] == "block_in_epoch")
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.epoch > epoch._value - uint(v: ${amount_of_epochs}))
    |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.weight_processed)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
    |> group(columns: ["epoch", "signer"])
    |> first()
    |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
    |> sort(columns: ["block_in_epoch"])
    |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["weight_processed"])
    |> sort(columns: ["block_in_epoch"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        duration: string(v: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000)),
        _time: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
        _start: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
        _stop: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
        _value: (float(v: r.weight_processed) / float(v: r.active_weight)) * 100.0
    }))
    |> sort(columns: ["block_in_epoch"])
    |> drop(columns: ["active_weight", "chain_tag", "signer", "weight_processed", "vote_time", "duration", "block_in_epoch"])

panels.title: Finality Progress - Voted Weight

panels.description:
- `value` = the epoch number
- Last 5 Epochs only
- Its an awkward chart. You must select the last 30 mins as timeframe to display properly (ie 180 blocks in minutes)
- Set to 5 mins for hayabusa devnet (18 block epochs)

targets.query:
import "date"

  start = v.timeRangeStart

  latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
    |> range(start: -1y)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
    |> group()
    |> last()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

  latestTime = latestRecord._time

  epoch = from(bucket: "vechain")
    |> range(start: latestTime)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
    |> group()
    |> last()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

  from(bucket: "vechain")
      |> range(start: -5h)
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "block_in_epoch")
      |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r.epoch > epoch._value - uint(v: ${amount_of_epochs}))
      |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 1}))
      |> group(columns: ["epoch", "signer"])
      |> first()
      |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
      |> sort(columns: ["block_in_epoch"])
      |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
      |> map(fn: (r) => ({
          r with
          _time: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
        _start: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
        _stop: date.add(d: duration(v: int(v: r.block_in_epoch) * 10000000000), to: v.timeRangeStart),
      }))
      |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag", "signer", "block_in_epoch"])

panels.title: Finality - Distinct Voters

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "epoch_length",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "chain_config"
)
list.label: Epoch Length
list.name: epoch_length
